pageContent: Background: The objective of this study was to evaluate the safety, feasibility, side-effect profile, and proof of concept for focal salvage therapy using high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU).

metaData.source:
Salvage high-intensity focused ultrasound for patients with recurrent prostate cancer after brachytherapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25443920/
